titles.title: Kidou Butouden G Gundam
Mobile Fighter G-Gundam
g gundam
機動武闘伝Gガンダム
Mobile Fighter G Gundam
หุ่นนักสู้สะท้านปฐพี จี กันดั้ม
机动武斗传 G高达

recommendations.recommendation: Definitely for completionists and insane (not die-hard, insane) fans only. I love about 90% of the Gundam shows out there, but I couldn`t stomach this one after a while.

anime.description: Created to celebrate the franchise`s fifteenth anniversary, Mobile Fighter G Gundam was Gundam`s first foray into alternate universes. In the year Future Century 60, most humans have left the polluted Earth behind and moved into space. To prevent war, the colonies have agreed on a Gundam Fight to decide control of the colonies for four years at a time. This year, Neo Japan`s Domon Kasshu, the King of Hearts, hopes to win with his Shining Gundam, but he hasn`t come to Earth simply to win the Gundam Fight. His concurrent mission is to track down and destroy the Devil Gundam which has escaped from Neo Japan and threatens to destroy the entire planet.

tag.name: robot
tag.description: A robot is an automatically guided machine, able to do tasks on its own. Another common characteristic is that by its appearance or movements, a robot often conveys a sense that it has intent or agency of its own. Not to be confused with android (human-like robot).

tag.name: martial arts
tag.description: Various sports or skills, mainly of Japanese origin, that originated as forms of self-defense or attack, such as judo, karate, and kendo.

tag.name: dynamic
tag.description: Some of the central structural elements in anime are: Plot Continuity How does the plot or several plots unfold. Are they a strictly linear retelling of one big continuing story, a serial, possibly with several side stories, or is the content chopped into a set of unconnected episodes, only sharing the same setting and characters? Stereotype Characters Then there is the question of the character set presentation. Is it completely original, or is it your usual stereotypical character cast. Both choices have their merit, for example it would not really make much sense to reinvent the wheel for a harem anime. Fans of that genre come to expect their favourite stereotype protagonists. Plot Twists Finally there is the question of how complex the plot / the story unfolds. Are there side-plots that merge into the main plot leading to unexpected plot twists, or is the anime quite predictable? The latter would not be appropriate for detective stories. In harem anime on the other hand a foreseeable outcome is actually something the fans will come to expect.

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: setting
tag.description: The setting describes in what time and place an anime takes place. To a certain extent it describes what you can expect from the world in the anime.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: time
tag.description: This placeholder lists different epochs in human history and more vague but important timelines such as the future, the present and the past.

tag.name: place
tag.description: The places the anime can take place in. Includes more specific places such as a country on Earth, as well as more general places such as a dystopia or a mirror world.

tag.name: calling your attacks
tag.description: "GIGAAAAAA DRIIIIIILLL BREAKEEEEEERRR" If you can do something more impressive than just throw a punch, your attack(s) must have an equally impressive name. More than that, you have to call it out as you launch the attack. It doesn`t matter if it`s a martial arts move, a magical spell or your secret superweapon, if you can`t say its name, it just isn`t nearly as cool or effective. Having a special attack is always a must, but not impressive enough. Every special attack needs a name. A really awesome and outstanding name which is easy to remember and even easier and impressive to yell. Because it just is not enough to name your attack. No, to unleash the full power of your attack, you have to call its name in your most MANLY and LOUDEST voice. It does not matter whether it is a martial arts move, a magical spell or flying drills from your mecha, if you can`t call its name, it just isn`t nearly as cool or effective. Not a requirement but wearing shades while calling your attack makes it at least twice as cool, moreover giving your mecha or magical companion shades too results in an immeasurable level of awesomeness, bringing down every enemy just through the POWER OF YOUR VOICE. A standard feature of practically every mecha, mahou shoujo, high fantasy, or martial arts anime. [Source: TV Tropes]

tag.name: super power
tag.description: Be it an ancient Greek Heracles, a cybernetic muscle-man, or a fourteen year-old girl in a mini-skirted sailor suit. As long as they have super powers, they`re in the show.

tag.name: future
tag.description: Anime that fall under the future category are the ones that have a society that could have originated from ours. In most cases it should go hand to hand with sci-fi since we expect the future to consist of advanced technology, however, in the case where it`s explicitly stated in the story that the anime takes place "x years into the future", the state of technology doesn`t matter as long as it`s long into the future. The anime can be set in an alternative universe not tied with our own, as long as it has a futuristic feel to it. This category sports quite a lot of anime, mostly stemming from SciFi, but not necessarily only from there.

tag.name: space
tag.description: The final frontier.

tag.name: Earth
tag.description: The Earth is the third planet from the Sun, and the densest and fifth-largest of the eight planets in the Solar System. It is in effect a ball of hot mud, but on the surface it`s cold enough, so most of us live on it (or are supposed to). It is circa 4.5 billion years old, and, unless we humans succeed in destroying it over the next couple of centuries, it is expected to last for quite another while, though the changes in the Sun`s emissions due to its aging will likely cause the extinction of everything; the species of earthlings are guaranteed to die, even if we fail to kill them -- unless, of course, we find ourselves another planet and figure out a way to take everything there. Our little planet on a corner of this galaxy may mean nothing in the grand scheme of things, but to its inhabitants it is their home, so, as a species, we cherish it dearly, to the point many cultures even to this day deify it. Being the home to the human civilizations, the Earth is the main setting of most fiction, be it anime or otherwise, but not only are many titles set in other places, such as unrelated fantasy worlds, in a considerable number of fictional titles the Earth is actually destroyed by aggressive alien invaders.

tag.name: mecha
tag.description: Mecha in Japanese basically means mechanical things; everything from an electric whisk or a car to a spaceship or a robot. Here however we limit it to the more exotic things usually referred to as mecha anime: robots, whether controlled by a human or not, and their ilk. See Androids, Piloted Robots, Power Suits, Robot Helpers, Transforming Robots for a more specific classification.

tag.name: space travel
tag.description: Space Travel usually refers going to space or travelling there with or without a spacecraft. There are different forms of space travel like Interplanetary travel, Interstellar travel or Intergalactic travel. Since it isn`t possible to travel faster than light, most anime series involve some sort "sub-space travel mechanism" as a way to travel faster than light.

tag.name: piloted robot
tag.description: Piloted Robots are, as the name suggests, robots that cannot control themselves; they need to be steered from somewhere, this can be from a human sitting inside or a remote controlled option.

tag.name: parody
tag.description: Anime that imitate other stories (can be from TV, film, books, historical events, ...) for comic effect by exaggerating the style and changing the content of the original. Also known as spoofs. It can also refer to when whole elements of one work are lifted out of their context and reused.

tag.name: other planet
tag.description: The anime will fit this category if some or all of the action takes place on another planet which is supposedly in the same universe as Earth, not a complete fantasy world; usually there has to be some concept of space travel. The Latin name for Earth - Terra, would also pass the condition of being in the same universe as Earth. Basically, even mentioning of Earth existing or having existed would be enough. Although Moon is a moon, it also qualifies as Other Planet.

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

tag.name: action
tag.description: Action anime usually involve a fairly straightforward story of good guys versus bad guys, where most disputes are resolved by using physical force. It often contains a lot of shooting, explosions and fighting.

tag.name: science fiction
tag.description: Science fiction stories usually focus on how situations could be different in the future when we are more technologically advanced; due to either our own achievements or having met with other civilizations whom we have learned from.

tag.name: comedy
tag.description: Anime whose central struggle causes hilarious results. These stories are built upon funny characters, situations and events. A comedy anime is laced with humour and sets out to provoke laughter from the audience. Japanese humour can be a bit strange to westerners, so if you`re new to this type of humour, just bear with it; it`ll most likely grow on you if you`re a fan of other kinds of comedy.

tag.name: romance
tag.description: Romance describes a story that deals with love between two or more characters typically also having an optimistic ending. Romance is also a difficulty encountered when creating a harem.

tag.name: disaster
tag.description: A disaster is a large-scale situation that causes great loss of or damage or threat to life, health, property, society, or the environment, irrespective of its source or cause. Disasters have substantial, long-lasting negative repercussions, and great effort must be spent in order to undo or mitigate their effects.

tag.name: unsorted
tag.description: a bunch of tags that still need to be either deleted or moved into proper places.

tag.name: fighting
tag.description: For some reason or other one faction has to take it out on some opponent via fight or battle. Typical examples of this are all the anime with "endless pointless fighting" tag.

tag.name: competition
tag.description: Some sort of confrontation occurs in this show. The protagonists "duke it out" via various competitions.

tag.name: happy ending
tag.description: And they lived "happily ever after"... *sniff*. All issues in the anime have been resolved, the love polygons sorted out, the conflicts resolved, the guy gets the girl (or the other way around), and everyone else lives on blissfully. (Not very realistic, but then again this is anime.)

tag.name: tournament
tag.description: A competition involving a large number of participants. Such competitions may range from friendly, moderated sporting events to anything-goes, all-out fights to the death. All participants take part in the tournament in want or need of the final goal and possible prizes; which depending on genre, may range from a boastful record at school to great riches and/or the granting of a wish. Depending on the type of tournament, contestants will either act alone, be permitted a team, or construct a team of chance throughout the ongoing competition.

tag.name: manly tears
tag.description: Somewhere down the line, it became the "norm" that boys don`t cry. The scenario does not matter; shedding tears is the ultimate no-no in terms of what you can and cannot do as a man (at least in the West, anyway). But there comes a time when a man`s emotions do get the better of him, and they pour forth - as prerequisite an impassioned speech may or may not be present - by cascading down his cheeks. These are what we like to call "manly tears". Extremely powerful. Not limited but often used in hot-blooded / super robot shows. Examples include Yuusha Ou GaoGaiGar, Getter Robo and Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann. The opposite of manly tears are "girly tears".

tag.name: end of the world
tag.description: The imminent end of the world may range from the total destruction of the planet Earth, to the destruction of Earth`s surface, or to the point where human life on the planet is no longer possible, aka the end of humanity. In any case it looks grim, and the protagonists battle to preserve what they can.

tag.name: the power of love
tag.description: The power of love is not only the strongest power known to mankind, it is the strongest power in the universe. The power of love conquers all things. It makes people cry, it makes people laugh, it can make them sing and occasionally it even brings dead people back to life, just so. More so than the power of friendship, the power of true love gives boundless strength and resolution; by the power of love every hardship can be overcome, every issue can be resolved and it does make people resistant to food poisoning (caused by the bad cooking of their loved ones). Even the big bad evil doesn`t stand a chance against the power of true love and often ends up redeemed. Even when the power of love is not literally and directly responsible, the scene is often set so that the audience is left with the impression that it was "really responsible".

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: multi-anime projects
tag.description: Many anime are created as part of larger projects encompassing many shows without direct relation to one another. Normally, there is a specific idea in mind: for example, the http://anidb.net/t4859 [Young Animator Training Project] aims to stimulate the on-the-job training of next-generation professionals of the anime industry, whereas the http://anidb.net/t3763 [World Masterpiece Theatre] aims to animate classical stories from all over the world.

tag.name: ending
tag.description: This is a container tag to house meta-like tags relating to how endings of anime play out.

tag.name: speculative fiction
tag.description: Speculative fiction is an umbrella genre encompassing fiction with certain elements that do not exist in the real world, often in the context of supernatural, futuristic or other imaginative themes. This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: Super Robot Wars
tag.description: Super Robot Wars is a series of tactical role-playing video games produced by Banpresto. The main feature of the franchise is having a story that crosses over several popular mecha anime, manga and video games, allowing characters and mecha from different titles to team up or battle one another. Due to the nature of crossover games and licensing involved, only a few games have been released outside Japan, and in English; early English-language games only feature Banpresto`s original characters and mecha, and a flagship installment were to never be released until 2016, with the English release of Super Robot Wars V in Southeast Asian countries. The franchise celebrated its 25th anniversary in 2016. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Touhoufuhai Master Asia
character.description: Master Asia, also known as Tohofuhai/Undefeated of the East, is Domon`s mentor, legendary martial artist, and winner of the previous Gundam Fight. Master Asia is capable of seemingly impossible physical feats and can destroy mobile suits with a piece of cloth. Master Asia was the previous King of Hearts before he passed it on to Domon and vanished for a time. When Domon sees him again, they unite to fight the Death Army but soon become heated enemies when Master sides with the Devil Gundam. The Gundam he used to win the previous Gundam Fight, Kowloon Gundam then transforms into the Master Gundam.

character.name: Rain Mikamura
character.description: Domon Kasshu`s childhood friend, who now serves as his support crew during the 13th Gundam Fight. A former medical student, Rain was recalled to the space colony of Neo Japan to assist her old friend in the tournament. This multitalented woman is both a trained medic and a skilled engineer, and in case of emergency she can even pilot a mobile fighter into battle. Rain is brave, friendly, and unfailingly loyal, but despite her generous temperament she often finds it difficult to deal with the stubborn Domon.

character.name: Andrew Graham
character.description: Andrew Graham is the Gundam fighter for Neo-Canada. While Argo Gulskii and his pirate crew were escaping from the space police, their ship collided into the station where Andrew and his wife, Norma were working as space police. Norma was sucked out into space despite Argo`s attempt to rescue her. Andrew blamed Argo for the death of his wife and entered as a Gundam fighter in a quest for vengeance. Domon would later facilitate an unofficial match between Argo and Andrew, which resulted in a draw. Afterward, Nastasha explained Neo-Russia`s ruling Norma`s death as an accident. Andrew refused to believe this and returned to fight Argo in the finals. It wasn`t until the two were matched against berserker Allenby that Andrew remembered the entire event; that it had been an accident. Realizing the error of his ways, he protected Argo by absorbing a permanently crippling blow from Allenby. Unable to pilot a Gundam any longer, he is last seen boarding a plane back to Neo-Canada for medical treatment. He piloted the GF13-037NCA Lumber Gundam (Grizzly Gundam in the dub).

character.name: RX-78-2 Gundam
character.description: The Gundam is one of three prototype mobile suits secretly developed by the embattled Earth Federation. After suffering tremendous losses to Zeon`s mobile suits earlier in the war, the Federation set out to create its own, using the very latest advanced technology. The Gundam is the most successful of these prototypes, a close-combat mobile suit protected by tough Luna Titanium armour, and armed with both lethal beam sabers and a devastating beam rifle as powerful as a battleship cannon. It`s also equipped with an advanced computer which learns from its pilot, ultimately enabling it to operate the Gundam automatically. In the hands of accidental pilot Amuro Ray, this one prototype mobile suit proves to be the equal of any Zeon weapon.

character.name: Domon Kasshu
character.description: The Gundam Fighter who represents the space colony of Neo Japan. Domon holds the title of colony martial arts champion, and his natural fighting abilities have been further honed through ten years of training under the legendary Master Asia, who chose him to inherit the title "King of Hearts." While his fighting skills are superb, Domon`s personality is brash and aggressive, and he has little concern for courtesy or chivalry. He nonetheless has a strong sense of justice, and will usually set aside his own mission when the weak and powerless require his protection.

character.name: Kyouji Kasshu
character.description: Domon Kasshu`s older brother, who assisted their father in the development of the revolutionary Ultimate Gundam while Domon was pursuing his martial arts training. Shortly before the beginning of the 13th Gundam Fight, Kyoji seized the Ultimate Gundam and fled to Earth, where the mobile fighter metamorphosed into the evil Devil Gundam. Domon is now charged with tracking down his renegade brother, and carries with him a fragment of a ten-year-old photograph to aid in this search.

character.name: Ulube Ishikawa
character.description: An officer of Neo Japan`s military, who supervises the colony`s Gundam development program. His experience as a former Gundam Fighter makes Ulube supremely qualified for this job, and to all appearances he is a reliable and patriotic soldier. However, behind the metallic mask that covers half his face, Ulube is quietly devising schemes of his own.

character.name: Karato
character.description: This high-ranking official of Neo Japan`s government serves as chairman of the colony`s Gundam Fight committee. Should Domon Kasshu win the 13th Gundam Fight, Karato stands to become prime minister of Neo Japan, but this timid bureaucrat isn`t confident that his Gundam Fighter will be able to deliver a victory.

character.name: Chibodee Crocket
character.description: The Gundam Fighter who represents the space colony of Neo America. Chibodee has risen from the mean streets of old New York City to become the colony boxing champion, with an unparalleled record of 100 consecutive victories. Cheerful, optimistic, and generous to a fault, Chibodee is the living embodiment of the American dream, and his rags-to-riches success story is an inspiration to young people throughout the world.

character.name: Sai Saishii
character.description: The young Gundam Fighter who represents the space colony of Neo China. As the heir to the 4,000-year tradition of the legendary Shaolin Temple, Sai has pledged to win the 13th Gundam Fight in order to restore the temple`s lost glory. In addition to being a master martial artist, he`s also an excellent cook, renowned for his superb fried rice. While the irrepressible Sai is exciteable, mischievous, and fun-loving, he has a strong sense of duty and is prepared to face any danger in order to uphold his family`s legacy.

character.name: George de Sand
character.description: The nobleman Gundam Fighter who represents the space colony of Neo France. When Earth`s elites left the planet to dwell in the colonies, the de Sand family remained behind to guard their homeland, and George sees himself as a knight upholding his family`s honorable tradition. Chivalrous and sportsmanlike to a fault, George is also a master fencer, whose swordsmanship is unrivaled even among the other Gundam Fighters.

character.name: Maria Louise
character.description: The daughter of Neo France`s ruler. This young princess is passionately devoted to the handsome knight George de Sand, breathlessly watching his exploits from her vantage point aboard the royal airship Damocles. Despite her high status, Maria Louise is a tomboy at heart, who disguises herself with jeans and a baseball cap when she sneaks off to carry out her own attention-getting plot.

character.name: Raymond Bishop
character.description: This lifelong servant of the de Sand family has raised George since childhood, playing the parental role and training the young nobleman in the courtly arts. Raymond now serves as part of George`s support crew in the 13th Gundam Fight, using his own antique mobile suit to continue his young master`s fencing instruction.

character.name: Allenby Beardsley
character.description: The young Gundam Fighter who represents the space colony of Neo Sweden. An orphan raised in a state institution, Allenby has been trained from childhood by Neo Sweden`s military to become the perfect Gundam Fighter. It`s not until she encounters Domon Kasshu that Allenby finally meets a martial artist of her own caliber, and the two soon become fast friends and sparring partners, bringing out a more playful side to both their personalities. However, Domon`s growing friendship with this rival Gundam Fighter proves quite distressing for his loyal partner Rain Mikamura.

character.name: Schwarz Bruder
character.description: The masked Gundam Fighter who represents the space colony of Neo Germany. A master of German Ninjutsu, Schwarz has near-magical powers of stealth and deception; he can appear and disappear at will, disguise himself with ease, and confound his foes with illusions and Ninja trickery. Fortunately for Domon Kasshu, this mysterious fighter seems to be on his side, appearing at key moments to protect Domon from danger and teach him the discipline of a true warrior.

character.name: Argo Gulskii
character.description: The convict Gundam Fighter who represents the space colony of Neo Russia. Once a notorious space pirate, Argo is now a prisoner of Neo Russia, forced to fight in the tournament to win the release of his captive men. His masters - well aware of Argo`s courage and immense physical strength - keep the towering Gundam Fighter in shackles, with a bomb strapped to his chest just in case he disobeys their orders. Argo is a man of few words, a silent giant who knows no mercy and no fear.

character.name: Nastasha Zabigov
character.description: The supervisor of Neo Russia`s Gundam Fight support team, who commands the transport ship Gorby and serves as Argo Gulskii`s warden. Nastasha is cold-hearted and clear-headed, a talented tactician who will use any means to secure victory. However, over time she comes to trust and respect her glowering prisoner.

character.name: Wong Yunfat
character.description: As the prime minister of Neo Hong Kong, Wong Yunfat has ruled the world for the past four years, thanks to Master Asia`s victory in the 12th Gundam Fight. By the rules of the Gundam Fight, the previous winner plays host to the final phase of the next tournament, and so the finals of the 13th Gundam Fight are to take place in Neo Hong Kong under his personal supervision. Eager to cling to power, the scheming Wong is fully prepared to bend the rules of the contest in order to bring about the outcome he desires.

character.name: XXXG-01W Wing Gundam
character.description: XXXG-01W Wing Gundam (aka Wing Gundam) was developed in the colonies by Doctor J as a tool to take revenge on the Earth for the death of the leader of the colonies, Heero Yuy. The Wing Gundam was mainly in missions against OZ and the Romefeller Foundation. The unit is piloted by code-named Heero Yuy.

character.name: Shirley Lane
character.description: This formerly member of a New York City street gang was rescued from Neo America`s police by the colony boxing champion Chibodee Crocket and is now the team leader of his support crew and cheering squad.

character.name: Cath Ronary
character.description: This formerly member of a New York City street gang, was rescued from Neo America`s police by the colony boxing champion Chibodee Crocket and is now his personal physician.

character.name: Janet Smith
character.description: This formerly member of a New York City street gang, was rescued from Neo America`s police by the colony boxing champion Chibodee Crocket and serves now as his mechanic.

character.name: Bunny Higgins
character.description: This formerly member of a New York City street gang, was rescued from Neo America`s police by the colony boxing champion Chibodee Crocket and now she takes care of the communications and intelligence gathering for him.

character.name: Jentoru Chappuman
character.description: The former Gundam Fight champion who represents the space colony of Neo England. This legendary fighter and marksman accomplished the unprecedented feat of winning the tournament three times in a row.

character.name: Michelo Chariot
character.description: Michelo Chariot is a gang leader from Rome that uses his position as a Gundam fighter to do whatever he wants (as a Gundam fighter can`t be charged for crimes involving destruction of property on Earth). He was chosen by his home nation to represent them purely because of his fighting prowess.

character.name: Kiraru Mekireru
character.description: Kyral Mekirel is the Gundam fighter for Neo Nepal. A returning fighter from the eleventh tournament, Kyral was back then heavily predicted to win with his Tantora Gundam. In the finals of the 11th tournament, his only armament, left-handed claws, became stuck in the ground, rendering him unable to dodge a volley of blasts from his opponent, Gentle Chapman and his John Bull Gundam, who by defeating Kyral became a three-time Gundam Fight Champion. The attack caused an explosion in the cockpit, rendering Kyral blind. He later returned in the thirteenth tournament to avenge himself against all fighters with the Mandala Gundam.

character.name: Raizo Kasshu
character.description: Dr. Raizo Kasshu is the father of Domon Kasshu and Kyoji Kasshu. Together with his son Kyoji and wife Mikino he build the Ultimate Gundam.

character.name: Hans Holgar
character.description: Hans Holger is the Gundam Fighter of Neo-Denmark and the pilot of the Mermaid Gundam.

character.name: Shuffle Doumei
character.description: Throughout history, this mysterious secret society has watched over humanity from the shadows, intervening to steer the world away from destruction and enforce the codes of conduct that govern warfare.

episode.title: G(ガンダム)ファイト開始! 地球に落ちたガンダム
The Gundam Fight Begins! The Gundam that Fell to Earth
Que le Gundam Fight commence ! Le Gundam tombé sur Terre
Gundam Fight Kaishi! Chikyuu ni Ochita Gundam
episode.summary: As the Gundam Fight is about to begin, Domon Kasshu, the Gundam Fighter of Neo Japan, arrives on Earth after his Shining Gundam has unexpectedly veered off course and crashes in Rome. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 唸れ! 夢を掴んだ必殺パンチ
Roar of the Winning Punch
Coup de tonnerre ! Le rêve à portée de poing
Unare! Yume o Tsukanda Hissatsu Punch
episode.summary: As New York City is abuzz about Chibodee Crocket, the Gundam Fighter of Neo America, and his Gundam Maxter, Domon appears during a boxing match to challenge Chibodee to a Gundam Fight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 倒せ! 魔神ドラゴンガンダム
Beat the Dragon Gundam
Que justice soit faite ! Le maléfique Dragon Gundam
Taose! Majin Dragon Gundam
episode.summary: As Domon travels to Neo China, he is approached by two Shaolin monks who urge him to take on the Gundam Fighter of Neo China, who has apparently gone rogue. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仇は討つ! 復讐の宇宙刑事
An Old Grudge: Revenge of the Space Police
L’heure de la vengeance ! La rancœur du policier spatial
Ada wa Utsu! Fukushuu no Uchuu Keiji
episode.summary: Domon travels to Neo Canada to fight Andrew Graham and his Lumber Gundam, but Andrew refuses, and he is defeated unofficially, as no official match takes place. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: いざ勝負! 真紅のバラの貴公子
Challenge! The Red Rose Knight
Un combat d’homme à homme ! Le prince à la rose rouge
Iza Shoubu! Shinku no Bara no Kikoushi
episode.summary: In his eagerness, Domon interrupts a fight between Neo France`s representative, George de Sand, and another opponent, but George, disgusted at this cavalier attitude, refuses to accept the challenge. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大脱走! 囚われのガンダムファイター
Great Escape! A Captive Gundam Fighter
La grande évasion ! Le Gundam Fighter prisonnier
Daidassou! Toraware no Gundam Fighter
episode.summary: In Neo Russia, Domon has gone after the country`s Gundam Fighter, but he is arrested by the local police and thrown into a large prison. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 来るなら来い! 必死の逃亡者
Prepare to Fight! Desperate Fugitive
Une vie dans l’impasse ! Le Gundam Fighter désespéré
Kuru Nara Koi! Hisshi no Toubousha
episode.summary: Domon goes to Neo Mexico in order to fight the Gundam Fighter, Chico Rodriguez, but upon arrival he learns that the fighter has run away and is being hunted by the local authorities. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 強敵! 英雄チャップマンの挑戦
Powerful Enemy! Chapman`s Heroic Challenge
Un héros pour adversaire ! Le défi de Chapman
Kyouteki! Eiyuu Chapman no Chousen
episode.summary: Domon tries to defeat Neo England`s Gentle Chapman who has won his fights through the use of unfair tactics. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 闘えドモン! 地球がリングだ
Fight, Domon! Earth is the Ring
Bats-toi, Domon ! Le ring, c’est la Terre !
Tatakae Domon! Chikyuu ga Ring Da
episode.summary: Domon returns to the Neo Japan space colony. There he undergoes a virtual reality simulation to determine if he is the right choice for Neo Japan`s Gundam Fighter. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 必殺技を盗め! 美女軍団の大作戦
Steal the Secret! Scheme of the Beautiful Warriors
Sus à la botte secrète ! Le complot des belles
Hissatsuwaza o Nusume! Bijo Gundan no Daisakusen
episode.summary: Chibodee`s pit crew notice how strange Chibodee has been acting lately, so they run off to the Guyana Highlands. Chibodee chases them, and in the process he finds Domon and begins to train with him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激闘! ドラゴンガンダム対ボルトガンダム
Fierce Battle! Dragon Gundam vs. Bolt Gundam
Un combat acharné ! Dragon Gundam contre Bolt Gundam
Gekitou! Dragon Gundam Tai Bolt Gundam
episode.summary: Domon and Rain are still training the Guyana Highlands. Rain is fixing the Shining Gundam while Domon continues his training. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大ピンチ! 敵は5大ガンダム
Big Trouble! Domon vs. Big 5
Catastrophe ! Cinq Gundam à combattre
Dai Pinch! Teki wa 5 Dai Gundam
episode.summary: Domon and Master Asia set out to search for survivors. Master leaves Domon alone and Domon is attacked by Chibodee Crocket, Argo Gulskii, Sai Saichi, and George de Sand. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 戦士の称号! さらばシャッフル同盟
Warrior`s Crest--Goodbye, Shuffle Alliance
La marque des guerriers ! Adieu, Alliance Shuffle
Senshi no Shougou! Saraba Shuffle Doumei
episode.summary: A Death Army soldier comes to tell Domon that he is to meet with Master Asia alone at the Tokyo Tower. Domon goes, but along the way is stopped by his four friends. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: その名は東方不敗! マスター・アジア見参
He`s the Undefeated of the East! Master Asia Appears
On l’appelle l’Invaincu d’Orient ! Master Asia entre en scène
Sono Na wa Touhou Fuhai! Master Asia Kenzan
episode.summary: Reports of the Devil Gundam surfacing in Shinjuku send Domon and Rain to Neo Japan. They run into an army of Death Army mobile suits controlled by the Devil Gundam and Domon tries to call his Shining Gundam. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 雨の再会... フォーリング・レイン
Reunion in the Falling Rain
Retrouvailles sous la pluie... Falling rain
Ame no Saikai... Falling Rain
episode.summary: In Neo Turkey Rain runs into an old friend, Saette Gyuzelle, from school. It is revealed that he is the Neo Turkey Gundam Fighter and he has been taken over by DG cells. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 衝撃! シャイニング・フィンガー敗れたり
Shocking! Shining Finger Defeated!
Inconcevable ! La défaite du Shining Finger
Shougeki! Shining Finger Yaburetari
episode.summary: Rain notices that there are four unidentified objects heading for Earth. She also notices that Master is going into an abandoned subway station. She follows him and loses him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恐怖! 亡霊ファイター出現
Terror! The Phantom Fighter Appears
Chair de poule ! Le Gundam Fighter fantôme
Kyoufu! Bourei Fighter Shutsugen
episode.summary: Domon and Rain travel to Neo Egypt in order to face off against the Pharaoh Gundam XIII there. Upon arriving, they find out the Gundam and its crew have been destroyed by a "ghost". Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最強最悪! デビルガンダム現わる
Ultimate Power and Evil! Rise of the Dark Gundam
Surpuissant et démoniaque ! Le Devil Gundam sort de l’ombre
Saikyou Saiaku! Devil Gundam Arawaru
episode.summary: An earthquake shakes Shinjuku, and all the members of the Shuffle Alliance along with their crews are trapped underground. Rain stumbles upon the Devil Gundam, which is absorbing its Death Army mobile suits. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ジョルジュよ, 悪夢を打ち砕け!
George, Beat the Nightmare!
George, Beat the Nightmare!
George yo, Akumu o Uchikudake!
episode.summary: Practicing with his butler, George is haunted by a massacre that occurred in the Neo France colony a year before. He was fighting a fellow candidate for the 13th Gundam Fight, Jean-Pierre Mirabeau, when the king refused to acknowledge Mirabeau as the winner due to his unfair tactics. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 対決! 謎の覆面ファイター
Challenge! Mysterious Masked Fighter
Confrontation ! Le Gundam Fighter masqué
Taiketsu! Nazo no Fukumen Fighter
episode.summary: Master Asia uses his knowledge of Domon and his reactions in order to lure Domon away from Shinjuku. While chasing what appears to be the Master Gundam, he is stopped by Schwarz who tries to persuade him to stop chasing after Master Asia. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決勝迫る! タイムリミット3日前
The Final Battle Approaches! Only 3 Days Away
La phase finale approche ! Trois jours pour y parvenir
Kesshou Semaru! Time Limit Mikka Mae
episode.summary: With the finals only 3 days away, the four other members of the Shuffle Alliance wait for Domon to finish his training so they can leave for Neo Hong Kong, where the finals will take place. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決着の時! 豪熱マシンガンパンチ
Showdown! Bursting Machinegun Punch
Le moment de vérité ! L’incandescent Mitrapoing
Kecchaku no Toki! Gounetsu Machine Gun Punch
episode.summary: Now that the Devil Gundam is back, Domon requests the help of the Shuffle Alliance. However, they all refuse because the only person they want to fight is Domon. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 頑張れドモン! 友に捧げた大勝利
Hang on, Domon! Triumph of the Restored Faith
Courage, Domon ! L’amitié est la clé de la victoire
Ganbare Domon! Tomo ni Sasageta Daishouri
episode.summary: Domon is about to face off against Cobra Gundam of Neo India. The pilot of Cobra Gundam has no qualms about hurting Domon before the match. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 地球SOS! 出撃ガンダム連合!!
Earth`s S.O.S.! Gundam Federation Rescue
SOS Terre ! Les Gundam alliés décollent
Chikyuu SOS! Shutsugeki Gundam Rengou!!
episode.summary: Domon`s father is now out of his cryogenic state and says that to beat the Devil Gundam Domon must destroy the colony`s power source. Gundams from around the world gather to defend the Earth from the Devil Gundam. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 騎士の誇り! 奪われたガンダムローズ
A Knight`s Pride! Gundam Rose Stolen
L’honneur du chevalier ! On a volé le Gundam Rose
Kishi no Hokori! Ubawareta Gundam Rose
episode.summary: George and Domon are set to fight each other, but the King of Neo France says there is no need, so he locks up Gundam Rose. However, George`s feelings are so strong he steals Gundam Rose and challenges Domon to a fight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 宿命の闘い! ドモン対デビルガンダム
Destined Battle! Domon vs. Dark Gundam
Le combat fatidique ! Domon contre le Devil Gundam
Shukumei no Tatakai! Domon Tai Devil Gundam
episode.summary: The other members of the Shuffle Alliance all escape the Guyana Highlands. Domon stays back to defeat Master Asia and the Devil Gundam. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 石破天驚拳! 決闘マスター・アジア
The Ultimate Attack! Duel with Master Asia
La Paume qui fend le ciel ! Duel contre Master Asia
Sekiha Tenkyouken! Kettou Master Asia
episode.summary: Domon goes looking for Allenby because she went missing. He yelled at Rain because she was supposed to look after Allenby. Fuun Saiki, Master Asia`s horse, comes and delivers Domon to Master Asia. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 強襲四天王! ガンダムヘブンズソード
Assault of the Four Evil Kings! Soaring Raven Gundam
Les cavaliers de l’apocalypse ! Le Gundam Heaven’s Sword
Kyoushuu Shitennou! Gundam Heaven`s Sword
episode.summary: With the help of Sai Saici and Argo, Domon defeats Michelo and heads for the next Heavenly King, Grand Gundam. Meanwhile at the hospital it is revealed the Devil Gundam was intended to restore the Earth. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新たなる輝き! ゴッドガンダム誕生
Bright New Star! The Birth of the Burning Gundam
Une lumière nouvelle ! L’arrivée du God Gundam
Aratanaru Kagayaki! God Gundam Tanjou
episode.summary: The four members of the Shuffle Alliance reach Neo Hong Kong for the finals, however Domon is not there. Still trapped in the Guyana Highlands, he spots a Neo Japan capsule containing the God Gundam. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 危険な罠! ネロスガンダムの大逆襲
Dangerous Trap! Neros Gundam Strikes Back
Un piège mortel ! La revanche du Neros Gundam
Kiken na Wana! Neros Gundam no Daigyakushuu
episode.summary: Michelo Chariot is Domon`s next opponent. Michelo and other fighters Domon has faced off with in the past set some traps to hurt Domon and the other Shuffle Alliance members. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ドモン対アルゴ! 突撃ボルトガンダム
Domon vs. Argo! Charging Bolt Gundam
Domon contre Argo ! La charge du Bolt Gundam
Domon Tai Argo! Totsugeki Bolt Gundam
episode.summary: Andrew Graham of Neo Canada is facing off against Argo. Argo goes into Hyper Mode and uses a new technique, the Gaia Crusher, to create mountains in the ring. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 戦士の絆! デビル包囲網を突破せよ
Breakthrough! Warriors` Strong Ties
Le lien des guerriers ! Par-delà la toile du Devil Gundam
Senshi no Kizuna! Devil Houimou o Toppa Seyo
episode.summary: Being attacked by several Gundam Heads the Shuffle Alliance and crew retreat. The Shuffle Alliance members decide to fight the Death Army in order to give Rain and Domon time to fix the Shining Gundam which was heavily damaged by Master Asia. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 美少女ファイター! デンジャラス・アレンビー
Beautiful Fighter! Dangerous Allenby
Un Gundam Fighter de charme ! Dangerous Allenby
Bishoujo Fighter! Dangerous Allenby
episode.summary: Domon is set to face off against Allenby Beardsely, a female Gundam Fighter who defeated Argo in under a minute. He meets her in an arcade and fights her in a fighting simulator, ending in a tie after the machine breaks down. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決勝開幕! ガンダムファイター大集合
All Fighters Gathered! The Final Battles Begin
La phase finale commence ! La réunion des Gundam Fighters
Kesshou Kaimaku! Gundam Fighter Daishuugou
episode.summary: Domon arrives in Neo Hong Kong moments before the deadline. The opening ceremonies start and Domon and the others are surprised to learn that Master Asia is back in his Master Gundam. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 獅王争覇! グランドガンダム迎撃作戦
Royal Counterattack! Ambush of the Grand Gundam
Bataille pour la suprématie ! À l’assaut du Grand Gundam
Shishiou Souha! Grand Gundam Geigeki Sakusen
episode.summary: After Chibodee and George have defeated the Grand Gundam, Allenby appears and seems to be under the influence of the DG cells and Domon tries to reason with her. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: バトルロイヤル開始! 復活のデビルガンダム
Battle Royale Begins! Dark Gundam Revived
La mêlée générale commence ! La résurrection du Devil Gundam
Battle Royal Kaishi! Fukkatsu no Devil Gundam
episode.summary: Domon has Rain go scope out the situation with Schwarz/Kyoji while he goes to the Battle Royale. Rain sneaks in as a doctor and discovers that Schwarz is an android made up of DG cells. Rain`s father also finds out since he`s an expert in cybernetics. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新必殺技! 爆熱ゴッド・フィンガー!!
A New Weapon! Erupting Burning Finger
L’atout suprême ! Le foudroyant God Finger
Shin Hissatsuwaza! Bakunetsu God Finger!!
episode.summary: The finals have started and Domon`s first opponent is Zeus Gundam, the favorite to win the championship. Domon is restless, so he goes through Neo Hong Kong looking for a place to stay. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ピエロの幻惑! 怒れガンダムマックスター
Dazzling Power of the Clown! Get Mad, Gundam Maxter
Maudit soit le clown ! La colère du Gundam Maxter
Pierrot no Genwaku! Ikare Gundam Maxter
episode.summary: Chibodee lost his mother to a group of terrorist clowns and since then has been afraid of them. When his next opponent is Jester Gundam who copies everyone`s moves it looks like Chibodee will lose fairly quickly. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: G(ゴッド)ガンダム大勝利! 希望の未来へレディ・ゴーッ!!
Burning Gundam`s Great Triumph! A Hopeful Future.. Ready, Go!
Le triomphe du God Gundam ! En route vers l’avenir ! Prêts ? Partez !
God Gundam Daishouri! Kibou no Mirai e Ready Go!!
episode.summary: Thanks to the Devil Gundam`s self-recovery the Grand Master Gundam is resurrected and the Shuffle Alliance struggle to defeat it. The Devil Gundam Colony begins extending towards Earth, taking over most of it. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 試合放棄!? 恋にドキドキ, サイ・サイシー
Running Away! Sai Saici in Love
Défaite par forfait ? Le premier amour de Sai Saici
Shiai Houki!? Koi ni Dokidoki, Sai Saici
episode.summary: Sai Saici`s next opponent is the Mermaid Gundam. However he is distracted as he falls in love with the pilot`s sister, Cecil. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: レインの危機! デビルガンダムふたたび
Rain`s Crisis! Return of the Dark Gundam
Rain est en danger ! Le retour du Devil Gundam
Rain no Kiki! Devil Gundam Futatabi
episode.summary: Domon burns the Master Gundam and Master Asia`s body, proclaiming it to be the last time he will shed tears for Master Asia. The Devil Gundam needs a Core Life Unit that can produce life to function at its full potential. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 狙われたドモン! 殺し屋ファイターの必殺剣
Domon Targeted! The Assassin`s Staff
Dans la ligne de mire ! Le Gundam Fighter assassin
Nerawareta Domon! Koroshiya Fighter no Hissatsu Ken
episode.summary: Schwarz Bruder fights the Viking Gundam, easily defeating it. Domon`s next opponent, Kyral Mekirel, is an assassin who has one all of his matches by default by killing his opponents before the matches. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 地獄からの使者! チャップマン復活
Emissary of Darkness! Chapman Rises Again
Le messager de l’enfer ! Chapman est de retour
Jigoku kara no Shisha! Chapman Fukkatsu
episode.summary: George`s next opponent is Gentle Chapman. Like Michelo Chariot, Chapman is under the influence of Master Asia and the Devil Gundam. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 非情のデスマッチ! シュバルツ最終決戦
A Ruthless Fight! Schwarz`s Last Match
Un combat impitoyable ! Le dernier match de Schwarz
Hijou no Death Match! Schwarz Saishuu Kessen
episode.summary: Domon is set to fight against Schwarz to determine the overall winner of the individual matches. Prime Minister Wong has the ring rigged with 5,000 time bombs set to explode after 8 minutes just in case there is no winner determined by that time. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さらば師匠! マスター・アジア, 暁に死す
Farewell, Master! Master Asia`s Last Breath
Adieu, maître ! Master Asia s’en va à l’aube
Saraba Shishou! Master Asia, Akatsuki ni Shisu
episode.summary: The final fight begins. Domon and Master Asia fight an extraordinary battle, and Domon convinces Master Asia`s plans would`ve failed anyway. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 真・流星胡蝶剣! 燃えよドラゴンガンダム
Sai Saici`s New Attack! Blazing Dragon Gundam
L’authentique Papillon météore ! Enflamme-toi, Dragon Gundam
Shin Ryuusei Kochouken! Moeyo Dragon Gundam
episode.summary: The day before he is to fight Domon, Sai Saici isn`t at all worried about the match. However after reading his father`s will he decides to win the Battle Royale to revive the Shaolin Temple which was one of his father`s wishes. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 立てドモン! 嵐を呼ぶタッグマッチ
Stand Up Domon! Raging Tag Team Match
Relève-toi, Domon ! Le double duel de tous les dangers !
Tate Domon! Arashi o Yobu Tag Match
episode.summary: Schwarz Bruder goes to the Neo Hong Kong government building and sees the Devil Gundam in there healing. He is noticed by Master Asia, and he flees. He spots Rain following him and carries her to safety. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: シュバルツ散る! ドモン涙の必殺拳
Schwarz Rests in Grace! Domon`s Tearful Attack
Schwarz est tombé ! Les larmes de Domon
Schwarz Chiru! Domon Namida no Hissatsu Ken
episode.summary: Rain manages to save Allenby by destroying the Walter Gundam. Schwarz and Kyoji sacrifice themselves so Domon can destroy the Devil Gundam`s cockpit, defeating it. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: デビルコロニー始動! 大進撃シャッフル同盟
Dark Colony Activated! Attack of the Shuffle Alliance
Colonie Devil activée ! L’Alliance Shuffle à l’attaque
Devil Colony Shidou! Daishingeki Shuffle Doumei
episode.summary: Ulube now has the Devil Gundam at its full power, but though diabolical, he does not risk innocent lives, ordering an evacuation of the Neo Japan space colony. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 1b
Opening 2
Ending 1
Ending 2
Opening 1a
